(OOC: Well, Lucavi hasn't replied for a good month..)

-Rexon-

The Wolf/Fox bot sighs as he trots through the snow, the fluffy stuff sticking to his fur. He had been travelling for days, for want of something to do. He had not found a single bot yet.

Maybe there weren't bots on this planet. Nah. He dismissed that idea.. there had to be. Once he had reached the top of the mountain, he looked down and saw two tiny specks (Carnage and Teltoli).. bots?

Rexon settled down and watched them, eager to see what they did.
